pgrid.core.maintenance
Class ReplicationBalancer

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.core.maintenance.ReplicationBalancer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ReplicationBalancer
extends Object
implements Runnable

This class represents the replication balancer for load balancing in P-Grid.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt

resetStatistics

run

public void run()
When an object implementing interface Runnable is used to create a thread, starting the thread causes the object's run method to be called in that separately executing thread.

The general contract of the method run is that it may take any action whatsoever.

Specified by:
run in interface Runnable
See Also:
Thread.run()

remoteSearchPath

public void remoteSearchPath(PGridHost host,
                             SearchPathMessage msg)
Invoked when a remote search path message was received.

Parameters:
host - the sending host.
msg - the received message.

updateStatistics

public void updateStatistics(int commonLen,
                             int currentLen,
                             int lLen,
                             int rLen)
Updates the statistics during an exchange.

Parameters:
commonLen - the common length of exchanging peers.
currentLen - the current length of a previous peer.
lLen - the remaining length of the local path (path.len-commonLen).
rLen - the remaining length of the remote path (path.len-commonLen).
